original: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo dhammo
analyzed: gantha vippayuttam na ganthaniyam dhammam paṭicca gantha vippayuttaḥ na ganthaniyaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā gantha vippayuttam na ganthaniyam dhammam paṭicca gantha vippayuttaḥ

original: naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na a ganthaniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā gantha vippayuttam na ganthaniyam dhamma

original: paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo ca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo ca dhammā
analyzed: paṭicca gantha vippayuttaḥ na ganthaniyaḥ ca gantha vippayuttaḥ na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammā

original: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naaganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: gantha vippayuttam na a ganthaniyam dhammam paṭicca gantha vippayuttaḥ na a ganthaniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Ganthavippayuttaṁ naganthaniyañca ganthavippayuttaṁ naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: gantha vippayuttam na ganthaniyam ca gantha vippayuttam na a ganthaniyam ca dhammam paṭicca gantha vippayuttaḥ na a ganthaniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
